content.rendered:
Strong Legal Representation In Wrongful Death Nursing Home Claims

Losing a loved one in a nursing home because of others’ negligence is inexcusable. Although we cannot bring your loved one back, we can help hold the parties accountable and get you compensation for your losses.

Why Choose Our Team At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC?

We understand that choosing an attorney during such a trying time is difficult. With so many options, how do you know who to trust and who can secure the compensation you need?

Getting a law firm with the resources, the work ethic and the reputation to demand top dollar for your case is important. We are that law firm.

Here Is What Our Firm Is Known For

The following represents not only our mission statement, but also why we’re respected in the Ohio legal community:

♦ We Get Results

Over the years, we have obtained millions of dollars for clients in verdicts and settlements. Insurance companies know if they don’t offer a fair settlement, we will spend the time and money to take our clients’ cases to trial. This isn’t true for all law firms, but it’s been true for us since we opened our doors in 1968.

♦ We Are Committed To Our Clients

Our relationship with our clients is the core of our practice. At the initial meeting, you will meet with one of our attorneys to discuss your claim. We pride ourselves on being open and honest from the first meeting through the end of your case.

♦ We Have Confidence

We’re good at what we do, and the community here in Columbus and across Ohio knows it. Having represented clients across the state for 50 years, we’ve earned the respect of judges, opposing lawyers and even insurance companies.

♦ We Do The Hard Work

When it comes to your case, we will do what it takes to maximize your recovery. That means using state-of-the-art investigation and research methods. It means securing the services of top-notch experts to strengthen your case. Should the case require trial, we’ll have done the necessary legwork already to fight for a fair and just result.

♦ We Are Ethical

Our first duty is to you, our client, but our ethical obligations extend to the courts and our profession, and they are equally important to us. We will represent you with honesty, integrity and professionalism. We will strictly observe the confidentiality of your discussions with us.

These are just some of the indicators of our firm’s ability to deliver on our commitment to quality representation for our clients. That commitment includes treating you with respect and compassion as we pursue the best results possible in your particular case.

Let Us Help You

After a serious accident or other loss, you need to have confidence that your attorneys offer the best chance of securing the full compensation you deserve. Turn to our team to help you.

Call 614-360-2706 or simply contact us online. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
